To reset the stars, just quit as soon as the game starts.
To get the 1-2-3 star packs, you have to finish the game.

Yeah bro still works. You start a game with a throwaway lineup on Domination and quit after you get past the loading screen.
You do this with players you don't care about. I use this trick all the time with the MyTeam team (east + west all stars).
I have pretty much everyone out of there now though. I still do it. You get like 7000 points from the game, plus another 13000 for getting a duplicate gold player. Almost 20000 points a game.

I had an almost all gold lineup in the 8th seed. I didn't buy anything. I just played a lot of domination, and by doing that resetting stars glitch, it was easy.
I feel like a dick now though :( sorry man.

Dennis Schroeder at PG; he's extremely fast and has great ball handling. He's a very consistent shooter and his release is very easy to get used to. He's 6'1, that may be a problem for some people, not me though.
Kyle Korver at SG; the guy never misses a 3 as long as he's at least a little bit open.
Shabazz Muhammad at SF; very consistent shooter at mid range or at 3 point range. Sweet jumpshot as well.
Reggie Evans at PF; 99 defensive AND offensive rebound.
Jonas Valanciunas at C; has a mid range shot and great in the post.
These are my starters. I hear Gerald Green, Caldwell-Pope, Reggie Jackson, Terrence Ross, and Tim Hardaway Jr. are all good bronze players as well. I haven't been lucky enough to get them, so I can't tell.
